translation: Hello, everyone!
transcript: 大家好。

translation: My name is Xiang Jiaqiao, a sophomore at New York University Shanghai.
transcript: 我叫向家乔，是上海纽约大学大二的学生。

translation: First, I want to ask you a question.
transcript: 嗯，首先问大家一个问题。

translation: Did you ever dream of traveling around the world in your childhood?
transcript: 大家小时候有没有一个叫环游世界的梦想？

translation: Have you realized it?
transcript: 你实现了吗？

translation: Many people may not be able to make it for the time being.
transcript: 就很多人暂时都没有实现这个梦想。

translation: But in the past year, I was lucky enough to have a 101-day round-the-world voyage through the Semester At Sea study abroad program.
transcript: 但是很幸运过去的一年时间里,我通过海上学府项目完成了101天的环球航行。

translation: This is our route.
transcript: 这是我的航线。

translation: As you can see, we started from San Diego and travelled all the way to Hawaii.
transcript: 大家可以看到我们从圣地亚哥出发，然后一路到夏威夷。

translation: And to Japan, to Shanghai and Hong Kong, and then to Southeast Asia, such as Vietnam, Myanmar and India.
transcript: 然后经过日本，从日本到达亚洲，我们的上海、香港，然后东南亚的这一片越南、缅甸、印度。

translation: Then we sailed to the African continent to Mauritius, South Africa, Ghana, and Morocco.
transcript: 然后之后我们驶向非洲大陆到毛里求斯，这边是南非、加纳、摩洛哥。

translation: Finally we arrived in Germany.
transcript: 最后我们是在德国靠岸。

translation: On the MV World Odyssey, there were 536 students, 23 professors, and dozens of lifelong learners.
transcript: 那我们整个奥德赛船上536名学生、23名教授，还有几十位终身学习者。

translation: And we travelled around the world during the 101 days.
transcript: 就在这101天的时间里环游了世界。

translation: The ship is where we lived in the past 101 days, and we travelled 26,000 miles through 11 countries.
transcript: 那这个底下的这艘船就是我过去101天里，嗯生活的家,我们走了26000英里，经过了11个国家。

translation: Many of you may have no idea what it means to travel 26,000 miles.
transcript: 那对很多中国学生来说可能26000英里，你对这个进制不是很了解。

translation: Look at the statistics.
transcript: 我们看一下具体的数据。

translation: Our voyage covers a total of 42,236 kilometers, an equivalent of travelling the equator for 1.05 laps.
transcript: 航程一共是四万两千两百三十六千米，相当于1.05圈的赤道。

translation: This was calculated at the end of our trip and turned out to be very interesting.
transcript: 呃这这个是我们最后一天统计的数据，其实非常有意思。

translation: We consumed 9.5 million liters of purified water, 3 million liters of fuels, 1.4 tons of peanut butter, and 650 kilograms of strawberry jam.
transcript: 我们消耗了950万升的纯净水、消耗了300万升的燃料、1.4吨的花生酱，还有650千克的草莓酱。

translation: The statistics may seem staggering but this trip has almost consumed the least fuel and water in the history of the program, about 20% less than the last trip.
transcript: 嗯大家不要看这个数字很多，这个已经是海洋学府历史上消耗燃料和水几乎是最少的一次,我们比上一次上一届的学生少了20%左右。

translation: Then this is the interior of our cruise.
transcript: 然后这个就是我们船内部的样子。

translation: The upper left is our dormitory, which is divided into inner and outer cabins according to its prices.
transcript: 左上角是我们的宿舍，我们的宿舍分为内舱和外舱，当然价格不一样。

translation: The outer cabin allows you to see the sea.
transcript: 因为外舱你可以看到海嘛。

translation: There are two-bed and three-bed rooms.
transcript: 有两人间和三人间。

translation: I lived in a three-bed room in the inner cabin.
transcript: 我住的是内舱的三人间。

translation: And my two roommates come from the US and Peru.
transcript: 我的室友一个来自美国、一个来自秘鲁。

translation: This is a picture of the window of the outer cabin.
transcript: 那么这张图就是外舱自然镜的图。

translation: That picture, where a lot of people were standing, is the auditorium.
transcript: 这张图就是大家现在站的地方，就是我们的auditorium大礼堂。

translation: Meetings and general courses all took place there.
transcript: 我们整个船上的所有学生，比如说全体开会。

translation: We attended a course called Global Studies.
transcript: 包括我们呃有一有一门叫做环球研究的课。

translation: In which the teacher would inform us of the politics, economy, history and culture of each destination before we reach it.
transcript: 就是你每到一个港口之前会了解那个国家的政治、经济、历史、文化，这个我们大课也是在这个地方上。

translation: This is one of our classrooms, and due to limited space, we have to make the most use of the space on board.
transcript: 这个是我们其中的一间教室，因为船上的空间不够，所以我们只能就是非常合理地来利用船上的空间。

translation: For example, the dining hall serves as a restaurant when it's time for meals.
transcript: 比如说餐厅在餐饭点的时候就是餐厅。

translation: But at other times, it would be converted to be a classroom.
transcript: 但不是饭点的时候，我们会把它改造成教室来使用。

translation: The last picture is our deck!
transcript: 最后的这张图就是我们的甲板啦！

translation: As you can see, there's some food on it.
transcript: 就是大家可以可能看到这个，我们还有一些吃的在上面。

translation: It is also very interesting when we enjoy the sea on the deck during lunch, chatting as we eat.
transcript: 就是我们会在中餐或者午餐的时候也会到甲板上边看大海，然后边吃饭边聊天，也是一件非常有意思的事情。

translation: You may ask why I participated in the Semester At Sea program.
transcript: 怎么想到来海上学府这个学期。

translation: It took me almost a year to get the offer, because I had to write an application, apply for a scholarship, and wait a long time for my visas.
transcript: 从其实从最开始的想去申请这个项目，嗯差前前后后差不多一年的时间，你要写申请、你要申请奖学金、你要有那种特别漫长的办签证的这样一个过程。

translation: The program is very unique, and unlike other projects, each scholarship is independent of each other.
transcript: 呃包括海上学学府它是非常独特的，和其他项目不一样，它每个奖学金都是互相独立的。

translation: So to get a scholarship, you have to write different applications and letters of recommendation because each scholarship has a different focus.
transcript: 然后你要写不同的文书和推荐信来获得奖学金，因为它有不同的侧重点。

translation: For example, some may attach importance to your academic performance or your social activities.
transcript: 比如说它有注重学术的、注重你社会活动的。

translation: And some may be targeted at specific groups, such as ethnic minorities or international students.
transcript: 还有针对特定群体的，比如说少数族裔或者是国际学生。

translation: And this way, it can attract these kinds of students.
transcript: 它就可以吸引这样的学生来参加海上学府。

translation: After months of preparations, you naturally hold high expectations for the program.
transcript: 但是你发现你准备了那么多，你自然对整个海上学府都有非常非常多的期待。

translation: So when I told my friends I was going to take a cruise around the world.
transcript: 呃包括我跟我的朋友谈，我要去邮轮环游世界的时候。

translation: They burst into admiration, "Wow!
transcript: 他们第一反应是，哇！

translation: So romantic!
transcript: 好浪漫啊！

translation: I also want to go there."
transcript: 我也想去啊！

translation: Another friend envisioned a trip where I would suffer from seasickness and jetlag, chase the sun and there will never be sunset, enjoy the beautiful sea, bask in the sun, read books and update the latest moments in WeChat.
transcript: 然后这是我一个朋友他说，那么你们这个航程不就是一边晕船一边慢慢倒时差喽，追着太阳跑就一直不会日落喽，每天面朝大海春暖花开，就晒晒太阳、看看书、发发朋友圈。

translation: It would be a wonderful experience!
transcript: 挺好的。

translation: Before the trip, I held the same vision, but it was far from the real case.
transcript: 然后我当时好像也是这么想的，但其实你真正到船上看是完全不一样的。

translation: Since the cruise travelled across four continents, it is naturally a mobile classroom.
transcript: 嗯海上学府我们走过了四大洲，它自然是一个流动的课堂。

translation: But as a closed space, the cruise is a stable classroom in a sense.
transcript: 但是船本身作为一个封闭的空间，它又是一个固固定的一个课堂。

translation: So between such mobility and stability, how could we achieve the balance?
transcript: 那么在这样一个流动和固定之中，你要掌握怎样的平衡。

translation: How did the whole environment affect us?
transcript: 包包括整个环境也给我带来几个非常有意思的思考。

translation: These are some of the interesting things I'm going to share with you.
transcript: 在这里给大家分享一下。

translation: Well, my first point is actually about the relationship between people.
transcript: 嗯第一个思考其实是关于人与人的。

translation: After I went on board, I found my previous vision of reading a book and updating my latest moments on WeChat every day quite impossible because this was a world without WiFi.
transcript: 海上学府其实我之前说每天看看书、发发朋友圈是不存在的，因为这是一个没有WiFi的世界。

translation: We could see nothing but the sea.
transcript: 我们每天在船上你只能看到大海。

translation: The only way we communicated with the outside world was through an e-mail that could only send text.
transcript: 我们和外界唯一交流的方式是一个只能发送文字的邮箱。

translation: But later on, you would find life in such a WiFi-less world also very colorful.
transcript: 但是你会发现在这样一个没有WiFi的世界，你会觉得其实生活也挺美好的。

translation: You would find the things you normally don't do turns out to be very interesting.
transcript: 因为发现你过去不那么常做的事情，突然就变得特别有意思。

translation: Each day, outdoor activities on the deck are packed with people, including the tennis court, the basketball court, and the gym.
transcript: 就每天船上的户外活动，包括网球场、包括篮球场啊，呃健身房都人满为患。

translation: Some classmates even brought the Ukulele or the guitar.
transcript: 还有的同学他带了尤克里里，带了吉他到船上。

translation: They could attract a large group of classmates each time they played it.
transcript: 他随时随地就能吸引一大批的同学。

translation: And in the evening, we would play the once popular board games together, including the interesting Werewolf.
transcript: 包括晚上的时候，我们会捡起了很多年不玩的桌游，包括狼人杀也是船上非常有意思的一个活动。

translation: This WiFi-less world allows us to conduct more in-depth and convenient communication.
transcript: 说到没有WiFi的世界，人们之间的交流其实会变得更加的深入和便捷更加的顺畅。

translation: There was a time when I was chatting with my classmates late at night.
transcript: 我们我记得有一次，我在和同学深嗯深夜聊天的一个情况。

translation: During diner, we would normally choose a table for nine, including four American classmates, four black classmates and me.
transcript: 我们是晚上吃饭的时候开始九个人坐一桌，四个美国同学，四个黑人同学还有一个我。

translation: To get to know each other, we introduced ourselves with the three most-asked questions.
transcript: 我们刚开始大家就讨论，我们说三件套非常普遍，每个人都会问的问题。

translation: A brief self-introduction, the reasons for choosing the program and the most appealing country.
transcript: 第一个是做自我介绍，第二个是你为什么想来海上学府，第三个是你对哪个国家最有期待。

translation: Many of us, including me, expressed our expectations for Africa.
transcript: 那我们当时挺多同学，包括我们也说对非洲还是蛮有期待的。

translation: We wanted to see wild animals in South Africa and to ride a camel in Sahara.
transcript: 想去南非看野生动物啊，想去撒哈拉去骑骆驼啊这样的事情。

translation: So our topic naturally revolved around the African continent.
transcript: 所以我们的话题自然而然地就到了非洲大陆。

translation: The black students began to tell us about the history that we seemed to have never heard of before.
transcript: 然后那几个黑人同学开始跟我们讲一些我们好像之前从来没有听过的历史。

translation: Including black heroes and some very important historical events.
transcript: 包括黑人的英雄，包括一些非常重要的历史事件。

translation: Well, the American classmates and me widened our eyes with surprise.
transcript: 嗯那几个美国同学和我一样就是瞪大了眼睛。

translation: We had absolutely no idea about this history.
transcript: 就完全不知道这段历史。

translation: And when we said we had no idea about that, one black classmate said it was because current history books were hardly written from the perspective of the Black people.
transcript: 然后我们跟黑人同学一说，他会说因为现在的历史书它不是以黑人为主体视角。

translation: So the books would naturally ignore much of the black history.
transcript: 所以很多有关于黑人的历史就自然不会记录在书上。

translation: This is actually quite interesting.
transcript: 这实际也是蛮有意思的。

translation: Well, then I asked him why he wanted to study in the US?
transcript: 嗯后来我问他，那你为什么想去美国读书？

translation: In a very serious tone, he said he wanted to acquire a little knowledge in the US and return to make his contribution to the African continent.
transcript: 他就是非常严肃地跟我说，就是想去美国学一点知识，然后去回报非洲大陆。

translation: He firmly believes that Africans are very intelligent, and that the African continent has a promising future.
transcript: 他坚信这个大陆上的人民是非常聪明的，他们坚信这个大陆是有未来的。

translation: Their perseverance in their eyes may involuntarily remind you of the first group of Chinese students who ventured abroad to study a few decades ago.
transcript: 你看着他们坚毅的眼神，你可能会不由自主地想到几十年前中国第一批留洋的留学生。

translation: And who held the same ambition of acquiring enough knowledge from foreign countries and drawing on it to protect and serve our country.
transcript: 他们也就是抱着一种师夷长技以制夷的态度，来最后来报效我们的祖国。

translation: So in such an ambitious young people, we see an Africa full of hopes.
transcript: 所以有这样的青年你会觉得这个大陆有希望。

translation: Another interesting thing is that we actually felt restless at times on board.
transcript: 简单总结一下，其实还我们还特别有意思的一点，就是我们在船上其实是有躁动的。

translation: As I just mentioned, without WiFi, we could have in-depth talks every day.
transcript: 就我刚才跟大家说，看上去没有WiFi，我们每天都聊天的非常深入。

translation: And everything seemed to be quite normal and peaceful.
transcript: 其实好像一切都非常的平静。

translation: But as we started a nearly one-week trip from San Diego to Hawaii.
transcript: 但其实我们从圣地亚哥到夏威夷差不多是一周的这样一个行程。

translation: The topic suddenly turned when the cruise was about to reach Hawaii.
transcript: 快要到夏威夷的时候，船上整体的话题就突然转向了。

translation: Our topics seemed to suddenly revolve around our desire for the civilized world and WiFi.
transcript: 我们好像就突然转到了对文明世界的渴望，对wi WiFi的渴望。

translation: And a day before the ship arrived in Hawaii, when the ship regained access to the telecommunication signal, we all became excited.
transcript: 然后船最后一天到夏威夷之前，整个船上收到呃电信信号的时候，都躁动起来。

translation: With different dialects and languages, the students hurried to report the peace to their family or friends, and some begun to update moments in social networking sites such as WeChat and Facebook.
transcript: 大家赶紧就是打电话操着各国的方言来来给家人报平安，给朋友报平安，包括大家开始发朋友圈、Facebook这样的。

translation: It's quite interesting to see the sudden change of attitudes.
transcript: 就是这样反差还是蛮有意思的。

translation: To sum up briefly, you will find the relationship between people turns out to be more intimate in such a small space.
transcript: 简单总结一下，就是你会发现人与人的关系，在这样一个狭小的空间里面反而变得更加的亲密。

translation: We may have different cultures, values, or viewpoints, and but on the cruise, we have more direct communication and interaction.
transcript: 我们不同的文化、不同的价值观、不同的观点，在船上有了更加直接的交流与碰撞。

translation: Many times I may not agree or identify with the relatively extreme opinions of the other party.
transcript: 很多时候我都不会去认同或者理解那个对方可能比较偏激的观点。

translation: But this does not prevent us from respecting each other's views and conducting discussions.
transcript: 但这并不妨碍两种相互观点之间可以相互的尊重，我们可以相互的进行探讨。

translation: Because the truth will be furthered by discussions.
transcript: 因为真理它自然是越辩越明的。

translation: The second point I want to share with you is the relationship between human beings and nature.
transcript: 嗯第二个想跟大家分享的角度是人与自然的关系。

translation: In the oceanography class, the professor mentioned the relationship between man and nature.
transcript: 嗯讲到人与自然就是我们我在船上上了一节课是海洋学的课。

translation: The professor encouraged us to go to the top of the deck every day to observe the surrounding environment.
transcript: 我们的教授就鼓励我们每天去甲板的顶部去观察一下周围的环境。

translation: Because our route collided with the two areas where there are the largest number of the world's whales.
transcript: 看一看包括我们船实际上是经过两片呃世界上鲸鱼出现最多的一个区域。

translation: Ideally, we were told to take a photo every day and write a nautical diary.
transcript: 然后教授说你们最好可以每天拍拍照片啊，写写航海日记啊什么的。

translation: But in fact you can see nothing but the sea and water.
transcript: 但是实际上你会发现每天你去看几乎除了海、除了水，你是什么都看不到的。

translation: It's not hard to understand.
transcript: 呃其实也很很好理解。

translation: I knew in class there are deserts in the ocean just like the land.
transcript: 后来上课才知道海洋和陆地一样，它也是有沙漠的。

translation: Just as there are roads on land, there are routes in the ocean.
transcript: 陆陆地上有公路，那么海洋上也是有航线的。

translation: Our ship travelled the fixed routes, and most of the routes were deserts.
transcript: 我们的船也是绕着固定的航线行走，而我们固定的航线的绝大部分就是沙漠。

translation: At the end of the semester, we calculated and only a small portion of students were lucky enough to see the whale.
transcript: 当然在学期最后的时候我们做过一个统计，很有很少的一部分同学他们看到了鲸鱼。

translation: I saw two pods of dolphins, one pod heading in the same direction as our ship, and the other pod towards the opposite direction.
transcript: 我本人是看到了两群海豚，一群是跟我们船前进相同的方向，一群是不同的方向。

translation: You could see the marine animals that are not in the zoo or the aquarium but sliding past you.
transcript: 你每你看到那些海洋精灵不在动物园不在水族馆，就在你身边滑过游过的那个感觉。

translation: It's really a wonderful feeling to interact with nature.
transcript: 真的是与自然对话的那种特别美好的感觉。

translation: Well, before the trip, we studied every day, and we had no weekends.
transcript: 嗯，我们在船上之之前和大家说每天都是学习，嗯没有双休日。

translation: And on board, we studied two or three days a week, this was called "Study Day".
transcript: 当然我们会有2到3个日期，我们叫Study Day。

translation: One Study Day just collided with the day we crossed the equator.
transcript: 就我们有一个Study Day就是穿越赤道日。

translation: During Study Day, we would hold different events, such as the maritime Olympics.
transcript: Study Day我们会举办不同的活动，比如说有海上奥林匹克。

translation: This is the tradition of the Semester At Sea program.
transcript: 这个是海洋学府的传统。

translation: I think it is also a particularly good way of communication between man and nature.
transcript: 我觉得也是人与自然特别特别好的交流的一点。

translation: Because a long time ago, the marine navigation technology was not as advanced as the present ones, it was quite impossible to cross the equator.
transcript: 因为很早以前的时候航海技术不是那么发达，穿越赤道是一件可望而不可及的事情。

translation: Previous explorers would be very frightened when they arrived near the equator, so on that day, all other sailors would be off-duty.
transcript: 当当时的船员如果他们抵达赤道附近他们是非常惶恐的，就是除了当天值班的水手，所有的水手都会放假。

translation: They would sacrifice their pigs and lambs to the sea gods to pray for safety and a smooth journey through the equator.
transcript: 他们会用整猪整羊来祭祀海神以祈求平安，以祈求他们能顺利地穿过赤道。

translation: However, modern navigation technology is so advanced that we do not need to follow the ancient rituals, but we still stand in awe of nature.
transcript: 但是现代航海技术的发达，我们已经不需要去呃遵循那种远古的海神祭，但是那种对自然的敬畏还一直流传至今。

translation: Well, there were very interesting activities on the day when we were crossing the equator.
transcript: 嗯在海上学府我们穿越赤道日有非常有意思的活动。

translation: For the second half of my journey, I kept wearing a hat and my hair just grown back.
transcript: 这导致我后半程就照片都是戴着帽子的，头发也是刚刚才长回来。

translation: You may also be interested in seasickness.
transcript: 还有一点大家可能非常感兴趣的就是晕船。

translation: Many of you will ask me if I suffered from seasickness.
transcript: 很多同学会问我在海上会不会晕船。

translation: The answer is definitely yes.
transcript: 答案肯定是肯定的。

translation: But for the vast majority of the time, our boat was still very stable.
transcript: 但是绝大多数的时候，我们船还是行驶得非常平稳的。

translation: But in our trip from the San Diego to Hawaii, a professor left after he suffered from seasickness and went home.
transcript: 当然我们从圣地亚哥到夏威夷那一段，也出现了教授因为晕船身体不适只能回去。

translation: Another professor was dispatched from the US and flied over to us to continue the class.
transcript: 那海洋学府只好临时从美国再派一个教授飞过来给我们继续上课的这样一个过程。

translation: Well, the overall situation is still very good, and there is also an unlimited supply of medication against seasickness.
transcript: 嗯总体还是很好的，而而且船上的晕船药也是无限量供应。

translation: But I only had it twice during the entire voyage, because after taking it you would feel sleepy for more than ten hours.
transcript: 但是我整个航程也只吃了两次，因为吃完之后你会昏睡十几个小时以上。

translation: Some people coped with it quite well, but I was not well adapted, especially when our ship arrived in the African continent.
transcript: 我当然有的人就还好，我就不是很适应，特别是我们船到非洲大陆之后。

translation: It begun to shake heavily, and encountered some storms.
transcript: 开始变得特别的摇晃，会遇到一些风浪。

translation: It was easy for the professor to fall if he or she didn't grasp a platform like that.
transcript: 嗯教授上课的时候，如果不扶着像那样的讲台很容易就跌倒。

translation: When you slept at night, it was like going through a roller coaster, and you would move with the waves.
transcript: 你晚上睡觉的时候就像过山车一样，你会随着那个海浪波动。

translation: The most serious case occurred on one evening, when all the plates in our dining hall slipped out of the cupboard and broke.
transcript: 呃包括最严重的一次是晚上，我们餐厅呃餐盘全部从柜子里滑了出来，然后碎了一地。

translation: As you can see, this is the African continent and that is the European continent.
transcript: 这张图刚才给大家看到的是，这个是我们非洲大陆，这个是欧洲大陆。

translation: This is our trip from Africa to Europe.
transcript: 我们从非我们从非洲走向欧洲。

translation: The cruise was originally scheduled to land in Hamburg, Germany, but as we can see from the pink area, there is a storm.
transcript: 我们原定是在德国汉堡靠岸的，但是这个粉红色的区域实际上是风暴。

translation: That is also a storm, and this storm is still forming.
transcript: 嗯大家看到这有一个风暴，这有一个风暴，这个风暴还在形成。

translation: That is to say, if we stuck to our original route and ventured to Hamburg, Germany, we would certainly encounter the large circle of storms.
transcript: 也就是说我们如果按原定的航线前往德国汉堡的话，我们必然会通过这一大圈的风暴圈。

translation: In that case, the wave may reach as high as 11 meters to 17 meters, and the ship would absolutely not be able to bear it.
transcript: 那么当那个时候海洋上的浪高可能会达到11米到17米，这个船是绝对没有办法承受的。

translation: So in the end, the captain decided to change a route and headed to Lisbon, Portugal, and our 102-day flight was shortened to 101 days.
transcript: 所以我们船长最后不得不决定我们换了一个航线，我们在葡萄牙的里斯本靠岸，我们102天的航程也就缩短成101天。

translation: This is a real pity.
transcript: 这也是一个非常遗憾的事情。

translation: There were storms, but there were also beautiful memories.
transcript: 当然有风暴，当然也有特别特别美好的事情。

translation: This was one of three nights when we switched off all the lights so that we could see the stars on the sea.
transcript: 这个是晚上我们船把灯光全部灭掉，这样我们就可以看清海上的星星。

translation: We saw a cluster of stars on the deck with the naked eye.
transcript: 我们肉眼就在甲板上看了一个星星，这样的天我们有三次。

translation: The Milky Way is visible to the naked eye.
transcript: 肉眼是可以见到银河的。

translation: This is what we saw with the naked eye, very beautiful indeed.
transcript: 这个是我们肉眼看到的银河，真的是非常非常的美。

translation: This is the sunset.
transcript: 然后每天的夕阳，

translation: One advantage of travelling on board was that we could watch the sunset on the sea every day.
transcript: 我们还有一个福利就是看海上的日落，这个是每天都有的。

translation: So every day at about five or six or seven pm, the deck was full of people appreciating the sunset.
transcript: 所以每每天下午大概五六点、六七点的时候，甲板上也是人满为患，大家就会欣赏夕阳。

translation: Another merit is that the program gives me a chance to remain temporarily detached from the civilized world in such an Internet age.
transcript: 嗯海洋学府特别好的一点，就是它给了我在这样一个互联网时代有一次与文明世界稍微有一个隔离的这样一个过程。

translation: Since our generation, the communication between people and nature has been diminishing and it seems that people are spellbound by WeChat and the Internet.
transcript: 特别从我们这一代开始人与人与自然的沟通开始减少，大家可能每天就醉心于朋友圈，醉心于网络世界。

translation: And it seems we begin to forget the pure connection between nature and nature.
transcript: 开始似乎忘了自己与自然最本真的那种联系。

translation: The third point that I want to share with you is China and the world. This may seem to be too general.
transcript: 第三个想跟大家分享的话题看上去比较大，是中国与世界。

translation: Only seven out of the 536 students on board are Chinese.
transcript: 船上536名学生有七个中国人。

translation: But among the 14 ports we passed, there are two important Chinese ports: Shanghai and Hong Kong.
transcript: 但是我们船上15个港口有两个很，14个港口有两个非常重要的港口，一个是上海，一个是香港。

translation: So we were as precious as the giant pandas.
transcript: 就导致我们就像大熊猫一样。

translation: Especially when we were arriving in Shanghai, all other people asked us about the must-go places and must-eat foods in Shanghai.
transcript: 特别是快要到上海，大家都在问我们啊上海应该怎么玩、怎么吃。

translation: So on the ship, we were also a group that attracted much attention.
transcript: 所以在船上我们也是特很受重视的一个群体。

translation: When it comes to the relationship between China and the world, the first thing I want to share is related to the visa.
transcript: 讲到中国与世界的关系，首先我要想跟大家分享的是一个签证的问题。

translation: Well, many netizens have complained that the Chinese passports only allow the holders to visit a limited number of countries visa-free.
transcript: 嗯，特别是现在网上会有人喷嗯中国护照不行啊，没有办法让你说走就走啊。

translation: But this is not how I see it.
transcript: 其实这个给我的感觉不是这样的。

translation: Another thing I like about the program is that it makes me feel that the Chinese passports are becoming more powerful.
transcript: 还有学府给我们带来很好的一点就是你会清楚地感受到，祖国的护照在一天一天的更加强大。

translation: And that Chinese students need to apply for a smaller number of visas each year.
transcript: 而海上学府每一届中国学生需要申请的护照数量也在减少。

translation: From the beginning of our session, we only need to apply for six passports.
transcript: 从我们这届开始我们是需只需要申请六个护照。

translation: Namely the US, Japan, India, Ghana, South Africa and the EU.
transcript: 就是美国，然后是日本、印度、加纳、南非最后是欧盟。

translation: Our most recent benefit was in mid-2016, when Morocco granted the visa-free to the Chinese.
transcript: 我们最近的一次福利就是16年中旬的时候，摩洛哥给中国开放了免签。

translation: Which was once one of the most difficult visas for Chinese students in this program.
transcript: 摩洛哥曾经是海上学府中国学生最难申请的签证之一。

translation: In previous programs, Chinese students could not disembark in Morocco because they did not get a Moroccan visa.
transcript: 我们过去是有中国学生因为没有拿到摩洛哥的签证，就无法在摩洛哥下船的经历。

translation: So a powerful China actually brings us greater convenience.
transcript: 所以祖国的强大也实际上为我们提供了更好的便利。

translation: Another thing I want to mention about visa is that of the EU.
transcript: 还有签证想跟大家分享一点就是欧盟。

translation: There is a very strange rule, that is, you must submit the application 90 days before the trip.
transcript: 因为欧盟它它有一个非常奇葩的规定，就是你必须要在呃行程前90天才能提交申请。

translation: Our program lasted more than 100 days, which meant that I couldn't obtain an EU visa in Chinese mainland.
transcript: 然后我们海上学府一百多天，就是说我没有办法在中国大陆拿到欧盟的申请。

translation: There were also cases before when the Chinese students had to get off the ship in Morocco because they didn't get the EU visa.
transcript: 包括过去也有中国学生因为没有拿到欧盟的申请就得在摩洛哥提前下船。

translation: So they missed the graduation ceremony and also the most rewarding and memorable period.
transcript: 就错过毕业典礼，错过最后最黄金的那段时期。

translation: We were very concerned at the time.
transcript: 所以我们当时也是非常惶恐的。

translation: We have been contacting the European Embassy and the German Embassy in Osaka, Japan by e-mails.
transcript: 我们一直邮件在和日本的大阪的欧盟大使馆、德国大使馆联系。

translation: But we were still denied the visa, because it would take at least 10 to 15 work days to before a visa was issued.
transcript: 但是那边一直说不可以，因为按照规定至少要10到15个工作日才能出签。

translation: We were out of options.
transcript: 那这个时候我们没有办法。

translation: In the end, we went to the German embassy in Beijing.
transcript: 我们去求助了德国驻北京的大使馆。

translation: And the officials contacted the embassy in Japan and helped us with our application through e-mails.
transcript: 然后那边的使馆官员再与日本的大使馆联系，再帮助我们继续通过这样非常漫长的邮件的申请。

translation: When we arrived in Japan, we rushed to the German Embassy in the first place.
transcript: 最后当天我们抵达日本，我们第一时间赶到日本大使馆。

translation: And the staff looked at us and asked whether we were from the Semester At Sea study abroad program.
transcript: 然后那个工作人员看着我们说，你们是不是海上学府的学生。

translation: I was very happy at the time because I knew I could get the visa.
transcript: 当时心里其实很开心的，你就知道大概这个签证是能办下来了。

translation: And on our last day in Japan, we finally got our visa, which was great.
transcript: 其实也是最后我们一天就拿到了签证，也是非常非常好的事情。

translation: Well, the journey from Japan to Shanghai is an adventure for foreign students.
transcript: 嗯从日本到上海那一段，对外国同学来说是探险之旅。

translation: But for us, it was actually homecoming.
transcript: 对我们来说实际上就是返乡之旅了。

translation: We celebrated the New Year on the sea.
transcript: 呃包括我们在海上也过了海上的新年。

translation: During that journey, when we were still surrounded by the sea, my mobile phone picked up a 3G signal.
transcript: 从日本到上海那一段，在四周还是大海的时候，我的手机就收到了3G的信号。

translation: And the first thing we did was not to check our WeChat or contact our family.
transcript: 那个时候我们第一件事情不是刷朋友圈、不是家人联系。

translation: But to open the online shopping app and buy some hotpot seasoning like Haidilao, so that we could bring them to the ship.
transcript: 我们就打开了购物APP，然后买了一堆火锅啊、海底捞啊，这样的方便后带到船上吃。

translation: One the New Year's Day, our Chinese students opened the hotpot seasoning and then cooked it.
transcript: 然后大年初一的时候，我们几个中国人就是打开火锅，然后吃。

translation: It was especially ceremonial and brought me back home in an instant.
transcript: 特别有仪式感，感觉瞬间就回家那种感觉。

translation: In Shanghai, I first took a few friends to Haidilao and helped them discover authentic Chinese food.
transcript: 到了上海之后，我第一件事情带我几个朋友去了海底捞，领略一下什么是真正的中华美食。

translation: This shows our Chinese students and several international students celebrating the Chinese New Year.
transcript: 这个是过年的时候几个中国学生，包括几个国际生。

translation: We booked a dinner for the New Year's Eve on board.
transcript: 我们在船上的餐厅就是预定了年夜饭。

translation: Of course, we just ate steak.
transcript: 当然吃的是牛排。

translation: It was a strange but unique experience.
transcript: 虽然比较诡异，但是也是很很独特的一个体验。

translation: This photo was taken on the first day of the New Year's Day.
transcript: 这张照片是大年初一的时候。

translation: We were crossing the Straits of Malacca and maybe we were close to the land.
transcript: 我们在马六甲海峡可能是因为离陆地离得比较近。

translation: So we could pick up signals from Indonesia or Malaysia from time to time.
transcript: 我们时断时续地会收到印尼或者是马来西亚的信号。

translation: Then we were watching the Spring Festival Gala on the phone, and this made us feel at home.
transcript: 然后我们那个时候手机，其实我们看的是春晚，然后就在外面你会有那种回家的感觉。

translation: In fact, when it comes to China's relationship with the world, you will find that China is moving step by step to the world stage.
transcript: 其实讲到中国与世界关系，你会发现中国在一步一步地走向世界舞台。

translation: And foreigners want to understand China, especially many of my friends.
transcript: 而其实外国人对中国他是有了解的渴望的，特别是我很多朋友。

translation: As we set off for the next destination, they told me Chinese food was the best food they had ever eaten in their lives.
transcript: 在上海之后告诉我说，中餐是他们这辈子吃过的最好吃的食物。

translation: Chinese students who study abroad or participate in this program, and who may have the opportunity to go abroad as students or tourists.
transcript: 那我们每个留学生包括海上学府的同学，包括未来可能有机会去国外的，不管你是学生还是旅客。

translation: Should take the responsibility and obligation to help China better communicate with the world.
transcript: 都有这样一种责任和义务，来去帮助中国更好地与世界沟通。

translation: In a foreign country, you may be the only channel for foreigners to understand China.
transcript: 你在外国你可能就对外国人来说，你可能就是他们了解中国唯一的渠道。

translation: You are the messenger of cultural exchange.
transcript: 你们就我们就是文化交流的使者。

translation: Let's return to the voyage map.
transcript: 回到这张航程图。

translation: Actually, when I was preparing for the speech, I wondered whether my sharing would revoke some thoughts in you without sounding like fortune cookie comments.
transcript: 其实我在准备这个讲稿的时候，我也一直在想如果不给大家撒鸡汤。

translation: I wondered if I could call on everyone to pursue their dreams and have more thoughts about life.
transcript: 不号大不号召大家去追求诗和远方，我可不可以给大家带来一些思考？

translation: After the journey at sea, you may ask, why did you travel around the world in the first place?
transcript: 包括在海上，你每天看着大海回来之后，你会想，我环游世界的初衷是什么？

translation: What can the program bring me?
transcript: 海上学府这个学期结束，它会给我带来什么？

translation: Or what will it bring you?
transcript: 或者将要会给我带来什么？

translation: After a brief talk with my teacher, I came to realize that maybe travelling around the world requires no particular reason or values.
transcript: 后来和老师沟通之后，我其实想明白了，也许环游世界从来都不需要什么理由，也不需要什么价值观。

translation: It might be the most instinctive and primitive impulse of human beings.
transcript: 它或许就是我们人类最本能、最原始的一种冲动。

translation: Every young people is the inheritor and successor of human civilization.
transcript: 我们每一个青年都是人类文明的传承者和继承者。

translation: We should embrace the passion to explore the unknown world.
transcript: 我们就是有应该有这样一种向往，就是有就是应该有这样一种激情去探索未知的世界。

translation: Well, return to our program.
transcript: 嗯回到海上学府来说。

translation: As we can see, the cruise is called the World Odyssey.
transcript: 大家看到我们的船叫世界奥德赛。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么叫奥德赛？

translation: Why named the ship after the epic of the ancient Greek poet Homer 2,800 years ago?
transcript: 为什么用2800年前古希腊诗人荷马的史诗来命名这艘船？

translation: My guess is that the program expects us to show bravery and learn to deal with difficulties just as the hero Odyssey did in his 10-year journey at sea.
transcript: 我也想，那十年惊心动魄的海上之旅可能正是海上学府对我们的期待。

translation: There's a saying of the program, you may not see it very clearly, but we don't call it motto.
transcript: 大家在这儿看海上学府，大家可能看得不是很清楚，海上学府不是说校训。

translation: It's a saying that goes "The world is our campus."
transcript: 它会有一个格言说“The world is our campus”。

translation: And on the second floor of the building of New York University, Shanghai, there's also a motto saying "Makes the world your major".
transcript: 那上海纽约大学大家在二楼也会看到我们的motto也是“Makes the world your major”。

translation: With translation, the two sentences convey almost the same meaning, that is, making the world your classroom.
transcript: 两句话翻译过来差不多都是让世界成为你的课堂的意思。

translation: This is really the case.
transcript: 所以大家想一想，真的是这样的。

translation: The world is a gigantic classroom, and each of us is a unique individual there.
transcript: 世界就是一个巨大的课堂，我们每个人都是这个课堂的独一无二的自己。

translation: Our initial instincts and our dreams determine what we do and what we will do in this class.
transcript: 你每个人你的最初的本能，你的梦想决定了你在这个课堂要做什么和将要做什么。

translation: Finally, I want to end my speech by wishing you could find your innermost thoughts, pursue your own instinct, and sail through wind and waves in the classroom of the world!
transcript: 嗯最后也祝福大家可以找寻到自己最内心的想法，追寻自己的本能，在世界这个课堂里乘风破浪！

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢！
